sentences.sContent: Use a surveyor or architect to oversee and inspect the different stages of the work.
sentences.sCn: 用一名监察员或建筑师去监督和检查工程的不同阶段。

synos.tran: 监督；审查；俯瞰；偷看到，无意中看到

remMethod.val: over (在…之上) + see (看) → 高高在上地看 → 视察

trans.tranCn: 监视； 检查； 视察
trans.tranOther: If someone in authority oversees a job or an activity, they make sure that it is done properly
